43 #include "tapicore.hpp"
44 #include "std_msgs/Time.h"

54 // Constructor/Destructor
55 
56 TapiCore::TapiCore(ros::NodeHandle* nh) : nh(nh)
57 {
58  // Create the subscribers, publishers and services
59  helloServ = nh->advertiseService("/Tapi/HelloServ", &TapiCore::hello, this);
60  configPub = nh->advertise<tapi_lib::Connection>("/Tapi/Config", 10000);
61  lastChangedPub = nh->advertise<std_msgs::Time>("/Tapi/LastChanged", 5);
62  ROS_INFO("Started Hello-Service, ready for connections.");
63  heartbeatCheckTimer =
64  nh->createTimer(ros::Duration(HEARTBEAT_CHECK_INTERVAL / 1000.0), &TapiCore::heartbeatCheck, this);
65  heartbeatCheckTimer.start();
66  delSub = nh->subscribe("/Tapi/DeleteConnection", 10000, &TapiCore::deleteConnection, this);
67  clearAllSub = nh->subscribe("/Tapi/ClearAll", 2, &TapiCore::clearAll, this);
68  clearInactiveSub = nh->subscribe("/Tapi/ClearInactive", 2, &TapiCore::clearInactive, this);
69  connectSub = nh->subscribe("/Tapi/ConnectFeatures", 10000, &TapiCore::connectFeatures, this);
70  getDevsServ = nh->advertiseService("/Tapi/GetDeviceList", &TapiCore::getDevicesSorted, this);
71  getConnsServ = nh->advertiseService("/Tapi/GetConnectionList", &TapiCore::getConnectionList, this);
72 }
73 
74 TapiCore::~TapiCore()
75 {
76  // Shutdown all services, subscribers and publishers
77  connectSub.shutdown();
78  helloServ.shutdown();
79  lastChangedPub.shutdown();
80  configPub.shutdown();
81  heartbeatCheckTimer.stop();
82  delSub.shutdown();
83  clearAllSub.shutdown();
84  clearInactiveSub.shutdown();
85  getDevsServ.shutdown();
86  getConnsServ.shutdown();
87  ROS_INFO("Hello-Service has been stopped.");
88 }

92 void TapiCore::changed()
93 {
94  std_msgs::Time timemsg;
95  timemsg.data = ros::Time::now();
96  lastChangedPub.publish(timemsg);
97  sendAllConnections();
98 #ifdef DEBUG
99  debugOutput();
100 #endif
101 }
102 
103 void TapiCore::clearAll(const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr& cl)
104 {
105  if (cl->data)
106  {
107  for (auto it = devices.begin(); it != devices.end(); ++it)
108  {
109  // Iterate through all devices. If it's a Subscriber/ServiceClient iterate through its features and send a
110  // disconnect message (publisherUUID and publisherFeatureUUID = 0)
111  if (it->second.GetType() == tapi_lib::Device::Type_Subscriber)
112  {
113  vector<Tapi::Feature*> features = it->second.GetSortedFeatures();
114  for (auto it2 = features.begin(); it2 != features.end(); ++it2)
115  {
116  tapi_lib::Connection del;
117  del.Coefficient = 1.0;
118  del.PublisherFeatureUUID = "0";
119  del.PublisherUUID = "0";
120  del.SubscriberFeatureUUID = (*it2)->GetUUID();
121  del.SubscriberUUID = it->second.GetUUID();
122  configPub.publish(del);
123  }
124  }
125  }
126  // Empty the maps and notify, that the data has changed
127  connections.clear();
128  devices.clear();
129  changed();
130  }
131 }
132 
133 void TapiCore::clearInactive(const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr& cl)
134 {
135  if (cl->data)
136  {
137  vector<string> toDelete;
138  for (auto it = devices.begin(); it != devices.end(); ++it)
139  {
140  // Iterate through all devices; if they are inactive, iterate through theif features
141  if (!it->second.Active())
142  {
143  vector<Tapi::Feature*> features = it->second.GetSortedFeatures();
144  for (auto it2 = features.begin(); it2 != features.end(); ++it2)
145  {
146  vector<string> toDeleteCons;
147  // Iterate through all connections to search for a connection of the feature in *it2, so it can be deleted out
148  // of the connections-map lateron
149  for (auto it3 = connections.begin(); it3 != connections.end(); ++it3)
150  {
151  if (it3->second.GetSubscriberFeatureUUID() == (*it2)->GetUUID() ||
152  it3->second.GetPublisherFeatureUUID() == (*it2)->GetUUID())
153  toDeleteCons.push_back(it3->first);
154  }
155  // Iterate through this found (and deletable) connections, send a disconnect message (publisherUUID and
156  // publisherFeatureUUID = 0) and erase this entry in the connections-map
157  for (auto it3 = toDeleteCons.begin(); it3 != toDeleteCons.end(); ++it3)
158  if (connections.count(*it3) > 0)
159  {
160  tapi_lib::Connection del;
161  del.Coefficient = 1.0;
162  del.PublisherFeatureUUID = "0";
163  del.PublisherUUID = "0";
164  del.SubscriberFeatureUUID = connections.at(*it3).GetSubscriberFeatureUUID();
165  del.SubscriberUUID = connections.at(*it3).GetSubscriberUUID();
166  configPub.publish(del);
167  connections.erase(*it3);
168  }
169  }
170  toDelete.push_back(it->first);
171  }
172  }
173  // Now delete all entries of found inactive devices in the devices-map
174  for (auto it = toDelete.begin(); it != toDelete.end(); ++it)
175  devices.erase(*it);
176  }
177  changed();
178 }
179 
180 bool TapiCore::compareDeviceNames(const Tapi::Device* first, const Tapi::Device* second)
181 {
182  string temp1, temp2;
183  temp1 = first->GetName();
184  temp2 = second->GetName();
185  transform(temp1.begin(), temp1.end(), temp1.begin(), ::towlower);
186  transform(temp2.begin(), temp2.end(), temp2.begin(), ::towlower);
187  bool result = temp1 < temp2;
188  return result;
189 }
190 
191 void TapiCore::connectFeatures(const tapi_lib::Connect::ConstPtr& con)
192 {
193  string feature1uuid, feature2uuid;
194  double coefficient;
195  feature1uuid = con->Feature1UUID;
196  feature2uuid = con->Feature2UUID;
197  coefficient = con->Coefficient;
198  Tapi::Device *device1, *device2;
199  device1 = getDeviceByFeatureUUID(feature1uuid);
200  device2 = getDeviceByFeatureUUID(feature2uuid);
201  if (device1 == 0 || device2 == 0)
202  // At least one Device not found
203  return;
204  if (device1->GetType() == device2->GetType())
205  // Cannont connect devices of same type (publisher-publisher or subscriber-subscriber)
206  return;
207  if (device1->GetFeatureByUUID(feature1uuid)->GetType() != device2->GetFeatureByUUID(feature2uuid)->GetType())
208  // Cannot connect features of different message-types
209  return;
210 
211  // Who is publisher, who subscriber?
212  string publisherUUID, subscriberUUID, publisherFeatureUUID, subscriberFeatureUUID;
213  if (device1->GetType() == tapi_lib::Device::Type_Subscriber)
214  {
215  subscriberUUID = device1->GetUUID();
216  subscriberFeatureUUID = feature1uuid;
217  publisherUUID = device2->GetUUID();
218  publisherFeatureUUID = feature2uuid;
219  }
220  else
221  {
222  subscriberUUID = device2->GetUUID();
223  subscriberFeatureUUID = feature2uuid;
224  publisherUUID = device1->GetUUID();
225  publisherFeatureUUID = feature1uuid;
226  }
227 
228  if (connections.count(subscriberFeatureUUID) == 0)
229  {
230  // Old connection was removed before reassigning so connect devices/features
231  Tapi::Connection connection(publisherUUID, publisherFeatureUUID, subscriberUUID, subscriberFeatureUUID,
232  coefficient);
233  connections.emplace(subscriberFeatureUUID, connection);
234  changed();
235  }
236 }
237 
238 bool TapiCore::getConnectionList(tapi_lib::GetConnectionList::Request& listReq,
239  tapi_lib::GetConnectionList::Response& listResp)
240 {
241  if (listReq.Get)
242  {
243  vector<Tapi::Connection*> connectionVec;
244  // Store pointer to all entries in the connections map to a vector
245  for (auto it = connections.begin(); it != connections.end(); ++it)
246  connectionVec.push_back(&it->second);
247  vector<tapi_lib::Connection> msg;
248  // Now iterate through this vector and actually copy the data to a connections-msg-vector
249  for (auto it = connectionVec.begin(); it != connectionVec.end(); ++it)
250  {
251  tapi_lib::Connection connection;
252  connection.Coefficient = (*it)->GetCoefficient();
253  connection.PublisherFeatureUUID = (*it)->GetPublisherFeatureUUID();
254  connection.PublisherUUID = (*it)->GetPublisherUUID();
255  connection.SubscriberFeatureUUID = (*it)->GetSubscriberFeatureUUID();
256  connection.SubscriberUUID = (*it)->GetSubscriberUUID();
257  msg.push_back(connection);
258  }
259  // Respond to the request with this connections-msg-vector
260  listResp.Connections = msg;
261  return true;
262  }
263  else
264  // The requester sent a bad request
265  return false;
266 }
267 
268 void TapiCore::debugOutput()
269 {
270  for (auto it = devices.begin(); it != devices.end(); ++it)
271  {
272  ROS_INFO("Debug: Device-Element UUID: %s", it->first.c_str());
273  ROS_INFO("Debug: Device-Data: Type: %d, Name: %s, UUID: %s, Last Seq: %lu, Last Seen: %f, Heartbeat-Interval: %lu",
274  (unsigned int)it->second.GetType(), it->second.GetName().c_str(), it->second.GetUUID().c_str(),
275  it->second.GetLastSeq(), it->second.GetLastSeen().toSec(), it->second.GetHeartbeat());
276  vector<Tapi::Feature*> features = it->second.GetSortedFeatures();
277  for (auto it2 = features.begin(); it2 != features.end(); ++it2)
278  {
279  ROS_INFO("Debug: Device-Feature: ID: %s, Feature-Type: %s, Feature-Name: %s", (*it2)->GetUUID().c_str(),
280  (*it2)->GetType().c_str(), (*it2)->GetName().c_str());
281  }
282  }
283  // TODO: Print connections
284 }
285 
286 void TapiCore::deleteConnection(const std_msgs::String::ConstPtr& del)
287 {
288  string subscriberFeatureUUID = del->data;
289  deleteConnection(subscriberFeatureUUID);
290 }
291 
292 void TapiCore::deleteConnection(std::string subscriberFeatureUUID)
293 {
294  // Check whether there really is a connection for the delete-request
295  if (connections.count(subscriberFeatureUUID) > 0)
296  {
297  // There actually is a connection, so send a disconnect message (publisherUUID and publisherFeatureUUID = 0) to the
298  // subscriber
299  Tapi::Connection* connection = &connections.at(subscriberFeatureUUID);
300  string subscriberUUID = connection->GetSubscriberUUID();
301  tapi_lib::Connection msg;
302  msg.PublisherUUID = "0";
303  msg.PublisherFeatureUUID = "0";
304  msg.SubscriberUUID = subscriberUUID;
305  msg.SubscriberFeatureUUID = subscriberFeatureUUID;
306  msg.Coefficient = 0;
307  configPub.publish(msg);
308  connections.erase(subscriberFeatureUUID);
309  changed();
310  }
311 }
312 
313 Tapi::Device* TapiCore::getDeviceByFeatureUUID(string uuid)
314 {
315  // Iterate through all devices and see if the device has a feature with the given uuid. If yes, return a pointer to
316  // this device. If nothing is found, return 0.
317  for (auto it = devices.begin(); it != devices.end(); ++it)
318  {
319  if (it->second.GetFeatureByUUID(uuid))
320  return &(it->second);
321  }
322  return 0;
323 }
324 
325 bool TapiCore::getDevicesSorted(tapi_lib::GetDeviceList::Request& listReq, tapi_lib::GetDeviceList::Response& listResp)
326 {
327  if (listReq.Get)
328  {
329  vector<Tapi::Device*> devicesList;
330  // Create a vector with pointers to every element in the devices map
331  for (auto it = devices.begin(); it != devices.end(); ++it)
332  devicesList.push_back(&it->second);
333  if (devicesList.size() > 1)
334  // There is more than one device connected, so sort this list alphabetically
335  sort(devicesList.begin(), devicesList.end(), compareDeviceNames);
336  vector<tapi_lib::Device> answer;
337  // Iterate through the sorted vector and copy the data of the devices to a vector of Device-messages
338  for (auto it = devicesList.begin(); it != devicesList.end(); ++it)
339  {
340  tapi_lib::Device device;
341  device.Active = (*it)->Active();
342  device.DeviceType = (*it)->GetType();
343  device.Heartbeat = (*it)->GetHeartbeat();
344  device.LastSeen = (*it)->GetLastSeen();
345  device.LastSeq = (*it)->GetLastSeq();
346  device.Name = (*it)->GetName();
347  device.UUID = (*it)->GetUUID();
348  vector<Feature*> features = (*it)->GetSortedFeatures();
349  vector<tapi_lib::Feature> featureMsgs;
350  // Also iterate through all features of a device and copy the data to a vector of Feature-messages
351  for (auto it2 = features.begin(); it2 != features.end(); ++it2)
352  {
353  tapi_lib::Feature featureMsg;
354  featureMsg.FeatureType = (*it2)->GetType();
355  featureMsg.Name = (*it2)->GetName();
356  featureMsg.UUID = (*it2)->GetUUID();
357  featureMsgs.push_back(featureMsg);
358  }
359  // Assign the Feature-messages-vector to the Device-message
360  device.Features = featureMsgs;
361  // Add the Device-message to the vector of Device-messages for the response
362  answer.push_back(device);
363  }
364  // Copy the Device-messages-vector to the response and send the response (automatically done in background)
365  listResp.Devices = answer;
366  return true;
367  }
368  else
369  // Wrong request
370  return false;
371 }
372 
373 void TapiCore::heartbeatCheck(const ros::TimerEvent& e)
374 {
375  bool deactivatedDevices = false;
376  // Iterate through all devices and check their last heartbeat time. If this time has passed 2.5 times the
377  // STANDARD_HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL the device is marked as inactive
378  for (auto it = devices.begin(); it != devices.end(); ++it)
379  if ((it->second.Active()) &&
380  (ros::Time::now().toSec() - it->second.GetLastSeen().toSec() > 2.5 * STANDARD_HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL / 1000.0))
381  {
382  it->second.Deactivate();
383  deactivatedDevices = true;
384  }
385  if (deactivatedDevices)
386  changed();
387 }
388 
389 bool TapiCore::hello(tapi_lib::Hello::Request& helloReq, tapi_lib::Hello::Response& helloResp)
390 {
391  string uuid = helloReq.UUID;
392  unsigned long lastSeq = helloReq.Header.seq;
393  ros::Time lastSeen = helloReq.Header.stamp;
394  string name = helloReq.Name;
395  uint8_t type = helloReq.DeviceType;
396  unsigned long heartbeat = STANDARD_HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL;
397  map<string, Tapi::Feature> features;
398  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < helloReq.Features.capacity(); i++)
399  {
400  // Generate a new Tapi::Feature for every entry in the Features-vector in the Hello-call and create a map of this
401  // Features.
402  Tapi::Feature feature(helloReq.Features[i].FeatureType, helloReq.Features[i].Name, helloReq.Features[i].UUID);
403  if (features.count(feature.GetUUID()) == 0)
404  features.emplace(feature.GetUUID(), feature);
405  }
406  if (devices.empty() || devices.count(uuid) == 0)
407  {
408  // The device is not currently existing in our "database", so create a new Tapi::Device with this data and place it
409  // into the devices-map
410  Tapi::Device device(type, name, uuid, lastSeq, lastSeen, heartbeat, features);
411  devices.emplace(uuid, device);
412  helloResp.Status = tapi_lib::HelloResponse::StatusOK;
413  helloResp.Heartbeat = heartbeat;
414  changed();
415  return true;
416  }
417  else if (devices.count(uuid) == 1)
418  {
419  // A device with this uuid already exists in the "database", so just update its data with the received one
420  devices.at(uuid).Update(type, name, lastSeq, lastSeen, heartbeat, features);
421  helloResp.Status = tapi_lib::HelloResponse::StatusOK;
422  helloResp.Heartbeat = heartbeat;
423  changed();
424  return true;
425  }
426  else
427  {
428  ROS_ERROR("Hello message couldn't be decoded, looks like there is something wrong with the devices database. "
429  "Please try to restart the Hello-Service.");
430  helloResp.Status = tapi_lib::HelloResponse::StatusError;
431  helloResp.Heartbeat = STANDARD_HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL;
432  return false;
433  }
434  return false;
435 }
436 
437 void TapiCore::sendAllConnections()
438 {
439  // Iterate through all connections in the connections-map and send the data over the Config publisher
440  for (auto it = connections.begin(); it != connections.end(); ++it)
441  {
442  tapi_lib::Connection msg;
443  msg.PublisherUUID = it->second.GetPublisherUUID();
444  msg.PublisherFeatureUUID = it->second.GetPublisherFeatureUUID();
445  msg.SubscriberUUID = it->second.GetSubscriberUUID();
446  msg.SubscriberFeatureUUID = it->second.GetSubscriberFeatureUUID();
447  msg.Coefficient = it->second.GetCoefficient();
448  configPub.publish(msg);
449  }
450 }
451 }
